item.description:
Spring is here, come out of your gaming cavern. Meet, greet and socialize with fellow gamers in the area. Hopefully create new contacts to maybe spawn the creation of new game groups and expand your circle of friends. A great opportunity for new members of our group to make some contacts.

Some light refreshment and food will probably be provided depending on the RSVP count.
We might also have some small prices, primarily duplicate gaming books or miniatures I want to give away.

Let us know what you'd like to add to the agenda:

Previous Items had been:
- Play a GMless game that doesn't require preparation such as Universalis
- Watch a gaming related move (e.g. the Gamers, Monty Python, ...)
- Card/Board Games
- Tarot Card - Raffle / Tombola
- Beer Tasting
- ...

Christian
Your Friendly Organzier
item.name: Spring Fellowship Gathering
